short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Give Kudos to all your fellow athletes on Strava with just one click. More time to do sport yourself.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a "Kudos for all" button to your Strava Dashboard page. One click and kudos are given to all visible activities one after the other.  It is also possible to skip club posts.
